metadata.title: CVE-2023-49356 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability in MP3Gain v1.6.2 allows an attackerto cause a denial of service via the WriteMP3GainAPETag function atapetag.c:592.

criterions.comment: mp3gain: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
